description.value: Your knowledge of materials found in the wilderness includes some rare, but very valuable resources. When you use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heroic-crafting.heroic-crafting-actions.Item.KNJAA6peNXZoP7ap]{Forage Crafting Resources} activity, a critical success adds double the amount listed in Table 2: Gathered Income for the location’s level to your material trove each day. If you are a master in Survival, instead add triple the listed amount.

rules.text: Whenever you roll a critical success on a Survival check to Forage Crafting Resources, add double the amount listed in Table 2: Gathered Income for the location’s level to your material trove each day.
